consent.title: Gizlilik tercihleri
consent.desc: Istege bagli analiz ve reklam ayarlari sadece izninizle kullanilir. Gerekli ozellikler her zaman acik kalir.

legal.enFallbackNotice: Bu yasal sayfa su an Ingilizce yayinlaniyor, yerel diller hazirlaniyor.

cookies.title: Cerez Politikasi
cookies.openConsentCta: Analiz ve reklam izinlerinizi istediginiz zaman guncelleyebilirsiniz.

errorPage.title: Bir seyler ters gitti
errorPage.description: Sayfada beklenmedik bir sorun olustu. Ana sayfaya donebilir veya izin ayarlarinizi guncelleyebilirsiniz.
errorPage.reportDisabled: Hata raporu gondermek icin analiz iznini etkinlestirin.
errorPage.inlineFallback: Bazi etkilesimli kontroller gecici olarak kullanilamiyor.

stateBanner.runtime: Runtime translation preview is shown. This view is not indexed.
stateBanner.fallback: Complete content is not ready in this language ({language}). Canonical complete version is shown.
stateBanner.incomplete: Content is not complete in this language ({language}, state: {state}). Canonical complete version is shown.
stateBanner.mock: MOCK DATA is displayed on this page. This view is always noindex.

blog.listHint: Posts are visible even when translation is not complete; incomplete variants are not indexable.

list.description: Country-level entry points in the Atlas hierarchy.
list.emptyDescription: Try another filter chip to continue exploring the atlas.

helper.noOrigin: Ucus tahmini icin bir cikis noktasi secin.

list.title: Regions
list.description: Country-specific regional group pages without changing core parent chains.
list.empty: No region groups are available yet.

uiPage.notFoundDescription: This system page does not exist in Strapi yet.

account.title: Account
account.description: User account shell is active in read-only mode for now.
account.authStateBody: You are currently viewing the logged-out shell. Public registration and personalized account data are intentionally disabled in this phase.

roles.public: Public: read Atlas/Blog/UI and submit Atlas suggestions.
roles.user: Authenticated user: reserved for future blog submissions and profile features.
roles.editor: Editor/Admin: review and publish Atlas and Blog content.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.readOnlyBody: Dashboard widgets are intentionally limited until user-submission features are enabled.

ops.title: Ops Metrics
ops.subtitle: Internal aggregated metrics dashboard for local operations.

empty.title: No metrics collected yet
empty.desc: Run the metrics collector locally, then refresh this page.

disabled.title: Ops metrics viewer is disabled in this mode
disabled.desc: Set PUBLIC_OPS_MODE=local to allow local file reading in this environment.
